content:
be found in reality. It neither exists in nature
nor provides a legitimate basis for rational thought. The role that remains
for the infinite to play is solely that of an idea.“*
But that entails that since past events are not just ideas, but are real, the
number of past events must be finite. Therefore, the series of past events
can’t just go back forever. Rather the universe must have begun to exist.
This conclusion has been confirmed by remarkable discoveries in astron-
omy and astrophysics.
